explanation: [0-0] In a bright room, a young woman with short, wavy hair is standing on a wooden floor, wearing black sportswear. She is holding a long strand of brown hair in her hands in front of her stomach, smiling and looking forward. Behind her is a white wall with a white vent above and the corner of a white door to the right. The text "Hair holds memories" is displayed in white at the top of the screen.

[0-3] The woman in black sportswear then picks up the top of the brown hair in her right hand and uses her left hand to straighten and comb the hair downwards, making it appear neater and smoother. She lowers her head slightly, looking at the brown hair in her hand. As she moves, you can see that the brown hair below is slightly curled. Then she lifts her left hand and combs through her hair again. Then she looks up and smiles happily. Then the woman turns her mouth to the side and holds the brown hair in her right hand, placing it on her right shoulder.

[3-8] Then the scene switches to a long-haired woman in black sportswear. She has long, curly brown hair that falls over her shoulders. She holds a strand of hair in front of her with her right hand, tilting her head slightly to the left, looking forward with a smile on her face. The text "Yeah I know" appears in white at the top of the screen. Then the woman takes her right hand off the hair in front of her. Then the woman turns to her right and looks forward, revealing her long, beautiful curly hair. Then the woman looks up and smiles happily.
